properties.title: Age UK West Cumbria - Solway House, Workington

properties.description: The Carnegie operates a cafe six days a week as well as hosting many other activities. The intention behind our 'Cosy Club' is to invite people to sit in our bar area and stay warm. We hope to set up some activities based on what customers want - eg book swaps, board games, radio, tv shows. In addition we have Barclays Bank in the building two days a week who are willing to give people advice on budgeting etc. We are also working closely with Age Concern to whom we can make referrals.

properties.description: Our drop-ins is a relaxed environment were people can have a cuppa and talk openly about life, occasionally we will do a quiz. Health and Wellbeing Session held in Carnegie Theatre on TuesdayAll sessions are free

properties.description: The Warm Welcome takes place in the Community Hall with entrance from the drive on the RHS of church It provides tables and seating and a friendly welcome. Average attendance for lunch is currently 25. A parent and toddler group meets before the 'Warm Welcome' and a community choir meets afterwards at 1pm which is always open to new members. Cuppa provided on arrival, soup & roll plus cake lunch available from 11.45am, donation invited.
